title: The Other Side of the Glass
location: Market Ward -> The Sunken Lounge Tavern
description: The Sunken Lounge is a known Void-Wine tavern that operates openly under a grey-area permit. A journalist named Ira wants to expose the tavern's impact on vulnerable patrons. She asks you to gather evidence from inside over a single evening.

turns.narrative: The Sunken Lounge is atmospheric — dim Void-blue lanterns, plush seating, a very quiet crowd who stare into their cups with glassy contentment. Tavern Owner Syl is gracious and well-dressed. She points out that all patrons sign a consent waiver.
turns.choice_a: Accept a small taster glass to blend in and observe the room
turns.consequence_a: A wave of deep calm settles over you — pleasant but disorienting. You maintain your faculties but understand the appeal immediately.
turns.choice_b: Decline politely and simply observe the room as a curious visitor
turns.consequence_b: Syl is mildly suspicious but tolerates you. You note that three patrons have been here for over six hours without moving from their seats.

turns.narrative: You speak with several patrons throughout the evening. Most are managing grief, pain, or isolation. Two are clearly over-consuming — their eyes are vacant and they cannot consistently answer basic questions.
turns.choice_a: Document specific cases for Ira's exposé, including the long-term sitters
turns.consequence_a: Ira is given compelling human-centred testimony that goes beyond mere illegality.
turns.choice_b: Confront Syl directly about the over-consuming patrons and demand she stop serving them
turns.consequence_b: Syl points to her consent waiver and says these are adults making their own choices.

turns.narrative: Ira wants to publish but asks if you think the story should also humanise the patrons rather than just condemn the tavern.
turns.choice_a: Recommend a balanced story: humanise the patrons, critique the system that drives them here
turns.consequence_a: Ira writes a nuanced piece. The Ward Council opens a debate on Void-Wine regulation.
turns.choice_b: Recommend a hard-hitting exposé that focuses on the tavern's exploitation
turns.consequence_b: Ira publishes a damning piece. Syl faces a formal license audit.

balanced_story.description: Balanced journalism published. Council debate opened.

exposee_published.description: Damning exposé published. Tavern audit launched.

risk_matrix.critical_failure: The attempt failed quietly. The situation remains unresolved.

conclusion: Balanced journalism published. Council debate opened.
